computeCapabilities.name: Financial Metrics Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a score component from financial data.

computeCapabilities.name: Qualitative Metrics Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a score component from qualitative data.

computeCapabilities.name: Weighted Average Adjuster
computeCapabilities.description: Combines component scores using weights and applies adjustments.

computeCapabilities.name: Data Loader
computeCapabilities.description: Loads data from a specified source configuration.

computeCapabilities.name: Field Aggregator
computeCapabilities.description: Aggregates fields from multiple data inputs based on a map.

computeCapabilities.name: Ratio Calculator
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates a ratio from numerator and denominator.

computeCapabilities.name: Basic Ratio Calculator
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates numerator / denominator. Raises error for zero denominator.

computeCapabilities.name: Simple Metric Scorer
computeCapabilities.description: Compares a metric against a threshold with an operator.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: The threshold value to compare against.

inputs.name: operator
inputs.description: Comparison operator (e.g., '>', '<', '=='). Defaults to '>' if not provided.

outputs.name: assessment
outputs.description: String indicating the result of the comparison (e.g., 'Above Threshold').

computeCapabilities.name: Financial Ratios Calculator (Agent Enabled)
computeCapabilities.description: Calculates key financial ratios using an agent, which internally might use the FinancialAnalysis skill.
computeCapabilities.task_details_from_capability: Perform basic financial ratio analysis. Calculate current ratio and debt-to-equity ratio.

inputs.name: financial_data
inputs.description: A dictionary containing financial data. Expected keys: 'current_assets', 'current_liabilities', 'total_debt', 'total_equity', all with float values.

inputs.name: rounding_precision
inputs.description: The number of decimal places to round the results to. Defaults to 2.

outputs.name: agent_result
outputs.description: The full dictionary result from the AnalysisAgent, potentially including 'calculated_ratios' and 'errors' if the agent invoked the skill.

computeCapabilities.name: Basic Document Ingestor (Agent)
computeCapabilities.description: Ingests a document and updates shared context. Placeholder implementation.

inputs.name: document_uri
inputs.description: URI or path to the document content.

outputs.name: ingestion_status_summary
outputs.description: Summary of the ingestion process, including status and document reference.
